items.title: 'There's a great unity' - McIlroy says Team Europe are ready to win
items.summary: Rory McIlroy says the continuity that Team Europe have had since winning the Ryder Cup in Rome two years ago could be key as they aim to defend the trophy in New York against Team USA.

items.title: Fitzpatrick's parents to miss Ryder Cup after fan abuse
items.summary: Matt Fitzpatrick says his parents have decided not to attend the Ryder Cup in New York, partly because of the abuse they encountered from American fans at Whistling Straits four years ago.

items.title: Sciver-Brunt hits 122 in England World Cup warm-up
items.summary: Captain Nat Sciver-Brunt scores 122 as England beat India by 152 runs in the first of their two warm-up matches before their World Cup opener next week.

items.title: 'They will never ask that question to a man' - Bompastor
items.summary: Chelsea boss Sonia Bompastor says she is "not surprised" a recent survey has found 78% of women had faced discrimination while working in football.

items.title: Away Ryder Cup win would be among 'greatest accomplishments' - McIlroy
items.summary: Rory McIlroy says being part of a winning European team against the United States at Bethpage Black this weekend would represent one of the highlights of his career.

items.title: Stockholm marathon winner Alene dies aged 30
items.summary: Ethiopian runner Shewarge Alene dies aged 30, the organiser of the Stockholm marathon confirms.

items.title: Micron teams up with TSMC to deliver HBM4E, targeted for 2027 â€” collaboration could enable further customization
items.summary: Micron has confirmed it will partner with TSMC to manufacture the base logic die for its next-generation HBM4E memory, with production targeted for 2027.

items.title: Qualcomm's Snapdragon X2 Elite reference mini PC looks like a coaster â€” some designs are cooled by Frore AirJets
items.summary: Qualcomm has just unveiled its new X2 lineup of mobile SoCs, but they seem to be ready for the desktop as well, with mini PC reference designs. There's a frisbee-like circular design and a square device that can dock into an all-in-one base; both are thin and cooled by Frore's AirJet systems.

items.title: LGâ€™s new TV is designed to be easier for seniors to use
items.summary: LGâ€™s Easy TV includes a camera so seniors can make video calls to family members for tech support. | Image: LG LG is launching a new TV in South Korea designed specifically for elderly users who may struggle to navigate and operate modern smart TVs. The LG Easy TV features a simplified home screen â€¦

items.title: CoreWeave deal with OpenAI now worth $22.4 billion â€” another $6.4 billion of AI data center capacity added
items.summary: CoreWeave expands partnership to provide OpenAI with compute capacity.

Meanwhile, live images of the base Magic8 in the Sky Blue Glaze edition have surfaced online. The Magic8 series in the Sky Blue Glaze finish appeâ€¦

Moranisâ€™ last live-action movie was Honey, We Shrunk Ourselves, released in 1997, and while Deadliâ€¦

items.title: Harvey earns breaststroke gold as GB win six medals
items.summary: Grace Harvey wins gold in the women's breaststroke as GB add six medals to their tally on day five of the World Para Swimming Championships in Singapore.

items.title: England and Leicester lock Martin ruled out until 2026
items.summary: England lock George Martin will miss the autumn Test series after being ruled out until at least January following shoulder surgery.

items.title: The battles England need to win in World Cup final
items.summary: What key battles do England need to win in order to beat Canada and lift the Women's Rugby World Cup at Twickenham on Saturday?

items.title: Blackburn v Ipswich washout to be replayed in full
items.summary: Blackburn Rovers' Championship fixture against Ipswich Town is to be replayed in full following its abandonment on Saturday.

items.title: Fitzpatrick's parents avoid Ryder Cup over abusive fans
items.summary: European player Matt Fitzpatrick's parents decide not to attend this week's Ryder Cup - partly because of abuse from American fans in 2021.

items.title: Check that you're ready for invasive DRM with new feature built right into Steam â€” Secure Boot and TPM status now listed right in the app

Secure Boot and TPM are required for most modern online games, and pretty much every anti-cheat software relies on them. Now, all you need to do is open Steam to check if they're enabled or noâ€¦

items.title: Microsoft develops breakthrough chip cooling method â€” microfluidic channels can cut peak temps by up to 65%, outperform conventional cold plates by up to 3x
